value.title: StarCraft 2: soO's 1000+ ZERGLING Army!
value.excerpt: SoO is a big fan of making mostly Zerglings and Banelings. That's exactly what he does in this professional match of StarCraft 2 versus Ryung. While Zerglings are amazing, most Zerg players do eventually transition towards stronger units for a very good reason.  Support my work on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/lowkotv

value.title: StarCraft 2: SUPER-SATURATED BASES - GuMiho vs Solar on Lazarus Wastes!
value.excerpt: Lazarus Wastes is one of the winning maps in StarCraft 2 with the Team Liquid Map Contest 17 (TLMC17). Map is made by HoperONE and has a few unique features.
